lead_paragraph: Most Brazilians are pessimistic about impact on their country of the Olympic Games, scheduled to begin Aug. 5 in Rio de Janeiro, according to a study by polling group Ibope published in the Estado de S.Paulo daily newspaper.

headline.print_headline: Most Brazilians Expect Rio Olympics to Hurt Brazil: Poll
headline.main: Most Brazilians Expect Rio Olympics to Hurt Brazil: Poll

snippet: Most Brazilians are pessimistic about impact on their country of the Olympic Games, scheduled to begin Aug. 5 in Rio de Janeiro, according to a study by polling group Ibope published in the Estado de S.Paulo daily newspaper....
